title: IS_RAW_KEY_RELEASED
content:
0xEAA50861// IsRawKeyReleased
BOOL IS_RAW_KEY_RELEASED(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of released state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex was just released on the keyboard.This will not be triggered if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAMEVirtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsRawKeyReleased(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar released")
end
codeBlocks:
if IsRawKeyReleased(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar released")
end
